body:
The art looks good but other than that meh~...

I don't k ow why but this kind of ntr are just not my thing...When there's a shots involved or incest I don't feel the same aberration when they would be technically the same, I'm just being picky...

If it makes anyone feels better, a bigger dick is not equal to greater pleasure in a woman. Apparently, the womb being hit with a penis from the inside is comparable to being struck full force in the balls. So having a more average size dick is what most women are gonna want. Of course, only if women do want you or me which they definitely don't lmao.
So far, this is the only one from Hari Poteto that's not TL'd in English yet. Let's hope this happens soon :D
Perfectly good looking character and art ruined by ntr
